alert.note: Alert for Barbour; Russell (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 3:32PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Barbour and Russell Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 332 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking gusty winds along an outflow boundary along a line extending from Ladonia to near Spring Hill to near Boot Hill. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Phenix City, Clayton, Hawkinsville, Russell County Sports Complex, Spring Hill, Seale, Comer, Barbour County Public Lake Dam, Ladonia, Lakepoint Resort State Park, Boot Hill, Batesville, Twin Springs, Lugo, Uchee Creek, Fort Mitchell, Fort Mitchell Activity Center, Mount Andrew, Carter Acres and Phenix Drag Strip. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
